generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved surface with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, separated by curbs and trees, where a person is riding a bicycle, indicating it is a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple tall buildings with glass facades and other architectural features are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are present along the sidewalk and in the background, and some shrubs are visible near the sidewalk.
- sky: The upper portion of the image shows a clear blue sky with some clouds and electrical wires.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the image, riding a bicycle.
- rider: The person is actively riding a bicycle, which qualifies them as a rider.
- car: Several cars are visible on the left side of the road, parked or in motion.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white arrow is visible on a pole in the middle of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
